title: Ep. 138 - A Court of Wings and Ruin by Sarah J. Maas (PART 4)
itunes:title: Ep. 138 - A Court of Wings and Ruin by Sarah J. Maas (PART 4)
description:
Here we are! We've got chapters 47-63 of A Court of Wings and Ruin by Sarah J. Maas for you! We reconvene at the end of the big meeting of the High Lords and Lady, see the wall finally fall, and get down to the business of doing some battles! 
 Bonus Content: bird bubbles, #bathtubproblems, Lady Bird Johnson's First Lady Agenda, Melody's outlandish wishes, and so much more! 
 Lady Loves: 
 Melody: THE GREAT! It's great! It's on Hulu. 
 Erin: Nothing games! Try Bead Sort and Just Mowing. They're no-stakes, never get any harder or easier, and are super zen. 
 Episode Sponsor: 
 https://www.manifestcomics.com/ (Manifest Comics)! Melody's partner Michael owns a comic shop in Bayonne, NJ and it's been closed with all non-essential businesses for a while. But fear not! You can shop online! Plus, you can donate reader bundles which get given to kids who are picking up free lunches from the school district! 
Mentioned in this episode:
Preorder Naima Simone X Friends Book Boyfriend Box!!
This box has EVERYTHING you could ever want in a book boyfriend from Tessa Bailey, Avery Flynn, Farrah Rochon, Jayci Lee, Kennedy Ryan, Adriana Herrera, and Naima Simone.
You can look forward to paperbacks, signed book plates, limited edition book boyfriend mugs, the book boyfriend pajamas/loungewear, bookmarks and more!
Tiers include:
- Cinnamon Roll - $114.99
- The Alpha - - $169.99 
Enter the promo code BONKERS10 at checkout to receive $10 off!!! 
ONLY AVAILABLE UNTIL OCT 10, 2022!
If you have any questions, email orders@honeymagnolia.co.
https://heaving-bosoms.captivate.fm/nsbookboyfriends (Naima's Book Boyfriends)
content:encoded:
Here we are! We've got chapters 47-63 of A Court of Wings and Ruin by Sarah J. Maas for you! We reconvene at the end of the big meeting of the High Lords and Lady, see the wall finally fall, and get down to the business of doing some battles! 

Bonus Content: bird bubbles, #bathtubproblems, Lady Bird Johnson's First Lady Agenda, Melody's outlandish wishes, and so much more! 

Lady Loves: 

Melody: THE GREAT! It's great! It's on Hulu. 

Erin: Nothing games! Try Bead Sort and Just Mowing. They're no-stakes, never get any harder or easier, and are super zen. 

Episode Sponsor: 

Manifest Comics! Melody's partner Michael owns a comic shop in Bayonne, NJ and it's been closed with all non-essential businesses for a while. But fear not! You can shop online! Plus, you can donate reader bundles which get given to kids who are picking up free lunches from the school district! 

Mentioned in this episode:

Preorder Naima Simone X Friends Book Boyfriend Box!!

This box has EVERYTHING you could ever want in a book boyfriend from Tessa Bailey, Avery Flynn, Farrah Rochon, Jayci Lee, Kennedy Ryan, Adriana Herrera, and Naima Simone. You can look forward to paperbacks, signed book plates, limited edition book boyfriend mugs, the book boyfriend pajamas/loungewear, bookmarks and more! Tiers include: - Cinnamon Roll - $114.99 - The Alpha - - $169.99 Enter the promo code BONKERS10 at checkout to receive $10 off!!! ONLY AVAILABLE UNTIL OCT 10, 2022! If you have any questions, email orders@honeymagnolia.co.

Naima's Book Boyfriends
